mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id, name, sex, clan, birth, address, id_no, mobile, bankcard, frontpath, backpath,huotipath,idcardeffectivity, policedepartment, isused,businessno, createdatetime, updatetime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_No,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{backpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{huotipath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardeffectivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policedepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isused,jdbcType=CHAR},#{businessno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update user_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, clan = #{clan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_no = #{id_No,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bankcard = #{bankcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frontpath = #{frontpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backpath = #{backpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, huotipath = #{huotipath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcardeffectivity = #{idcardeffectivity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policedepartment = #{policedepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isused = #{isused,jdbcType=CHAR}, businessno = #{businessno,jdbcType=CHAR}, createdatetime = #{createdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, sex, clan, birth, address, id_no, mobile, bankcard, frontpath, backpath,huotipath, idcardeffectivity, policedepartment, isused, businessno,createdatetime, updatetime from user_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, sex, clan, birth, address, id_no, mobile, bankcard, frontpath, backpath,huotipath, idcardeffectivity, policedepartment, isused, businessno,createdatetime, updatetime from user_info
select count(1) as total from user_info
